home.title: Sales Form for individual sellers
home.model: Model (only one item per row, add line for each item)
home.certif1: By accepting the terms and conditions I certify that I am more than 18 years old and that my product(s) is/are genuine, not stolen, swindled, borrowed. I hold myself responsible for authenticity, conformity (no defects), origin of it.
home.certif2: I, the undersigned, declare on the honor the sale of this object and the veracity of this declaration.
home.fail: Fail to send form. Please retry or contact us if the problem persist.
home.mail: (Recommended) To stay informed about selling to copRoom for future releases & promotions, you can enter your email here
home.mailppl: Paypal account email. We will send payment to this email please be carefull
home.idExp: (Mandatory because we are a company / If number is not correct we will cancel the sale)
home.top-text: All informations are strictly confidential. If any information (name, ID number, ect...) is false we will have the right to cancel the sale.
home.bottom-text-1: This is a sale contract between you and the company ROOM GROUP SAS. Details about our company are available on
home.bottom-text-2: and sale terms are available on this
home.fillform: You must fill correctly all the required fields before being able to submit the form
